=== Chris Szikszoy ===

* Email:  * Launchpad: <nowiki>[[http://launchpad.net/~cszikszoy]]</nowiki>
* Blog: <nowiki>[[http://blog.chris.szikszoy.com]]</nowiki>

I've been using Ubuntu exclusively since Fiesty (7.04).  I am one of the core developers of <nowiki>[[http://launchpad.net/do|GNOME Do]]</nowiki>, and <nowiki>[[http://launchpad.net/docky|Docky]]</nowiki>.  I also actively backport packages from debian experimental to my PPAs.

==== GUPNP / Rygel PPA ====

I backport and upload gupnp and rygel packages to my <nowiki>[[http://launchpad.net/~cszikszoy/+archive/upnp|upnp ppa]]</nowiki>.  I will try to maintain and update the packages in the lucid ppa for as long as it's feasible.  And I will always keep the current version of ubuntu updated with current packages.
